reviewText: This video was the reference for hand-spinning cotton, silk and flax. While it doesn't go over the first processing stages of growing, scutching or hackling flax, it gives a good view of her spinning fine linen yarn out of a strick of flax.

This superb video goes beyond wool into other fibers. It is an excellent learning tools and I am so glad I have this to refer to. I enjoy the teacher so much that I sometimes run the video just to have some "company" while I spin... silly I know but it's hard to come by spinning buddies some days.
